title.narrative: Multitranche Financing Facility (MFF) - Madhya Pradesh Power Sector Investment Program - Project 5

description.narrative: ADB will provide support for the investment program in the form of a multitranche financing facility (MFF). Such support provides a platform for financial and expert assistance, blending reform and capacity development with investments.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Reduction of electric distribution system losses, improved reliability of power, increased system capacity and improved customer connectivity.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Loss targets for DISCOMs as determined by the Madhya Pradesh Electricity Regulatory Commission (MPERC) in its tariff determination for the year starting 1 April 2009 are met.

description.narrative: Reduction of electric distribution system losses, improved reliability of power, increased system capacity and improved customer connectivity.

title.narrative: Reduced average number of interruptions and average duration of interruption.

description.narrative: Reduction of electric distribution system losses, improved reliability of power, increased system capacity and improved customer connectivity.

title.narrative: Reduced customer complaints about quality of supply.
